attributes.background: Schools should be closed in September especially  where covid cases are really high such as Luton, Braintree and Peterborough. Online schooling would be a better option to keep people safer and reduce spread. This could help dramatically decrease the spread of the virus overall

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/316404
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319292
